Card_CategoryDescription_Dr1: The first game in the Danganronpa series.
Card_CategoryDescription_Dr10Anniv: The celebration of the 10th Anniversary of the release of Danganronpa: Trigger Happy Havoc in 2020.
Card_CategoryDescription_Dr2: The second game in the Danganronpa franchise following Danganronpa: Trigger Happy Havoc.
Card_CategoryDescription_Dr3Despair: One of the two story arcs in Danganronpa 3: The End of Hope's Peak High School
Card_CategoryDescription_Dr3Future: One of the two story arcs in Danganronpa 3: The End of Hope's Peak High School
Card_CategoryDescription_Drae: The first spin-off of the Danganronpa series of visual novel games, set between the events of Danganronpa: Trigger Happy Havoc and Danganronpa 2: Goodbye Despair.
Card_CategoryDescription_Drs: A massively enhanced version of Ultimate Talent Development Plan, the boardgame from Danganronpa V3: Killing Harmony.
Card_CategoryDescription_Drv3: The third (killing) game in the Danganronpa series.
Card_CategoryName_Dr3Despair: Danganronpa 3: The End of Hope's Peak High School - Despair Arc
Card_CategoryName_Dr3Future: Danganronpa 3: The End of Hope's Peak High School - Future Arc
Card_CategoryName_Drae: Danganronpa Another Episode: Ultra Despair Girls
